you did not give anyone permission to plug him into you. Nevertheless it
seems  to  me  plain  you  oughtto  allow  him  to  use  your  kidneys  for  that
hour—it would be indecent to refuse.
Again, suppose pregnancy lasted only an hour, and constituted no threat
to life or health. And suppose that a woman becomes pregnant as a result of
rape. Admittedly she did not voluntarily do anything to bring about the ex-
istence
